Class WTerminalResumeGameViewer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.clientSide.viewers.toTerminal.interfaces.WTerminalStatusViewer

All Implemented Interfaces:
SpecificStatusViewer
public class WTerminalResumeGameViewer
extends WTerminalStatusViewer
Class that represents the WTerminalStatusViewer ResumeGame on the Windows Terminal using methods of PrintFunction

Marco

    • showRestartImage

      private void showRestartImage()
      Prints a little image to represent the phase

    • restartRequest

      private boolean restartRequest()
      Prints and check the restart request: returns true and do the correct command if the command selected is correct, prints a wrong message and returns false if it isn't. Notifies the result with a message printed
      Returns:
      true if command == 1 || command == 2, else false

    • show

      public void show()
      Uses private methods to print a resume image and the resume request until the asked request is accepted
